translation.home_text3: Take a look at the services our clinic provides
translation.footer_5: Monday to Friday: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.
translation.about_text1: At our clinic, we have a team of qualified experts who have been in the beauty industry for several years.
translation.about_text2: The Dulce Beauty clinic offers you a wide choice of high-end services.
translation.about_text3: We prioritize the comfort and the satisfaction of our customers.
